content: Hello! I'm not technically a new member as I've been here since 2017, when I was at Imperial, but I've not done much Lean since and never introduced myself here. Now I'm a PhD student at St Andrews (UK) working on finite permutation groups. I'm preparing for my first PR, generalising definitions and lemmas on double quotients from rings to algebras. This is a easy topic to get myself started, suggested to me by @David Ang. Could someone invite me to the mathlib repo on GtiHub? My handle is "wupr".
Welcome back! You should have received an invitation.
Hi Peiran! Nice to see you here! I'm speaking at St Andrews in a couple of weeks BTW.
Hi Kevin! Yes, I saw your talk on this semester's schedule. I can't wait.
@Peiran Wu Feel free to ping me for a review once your code is ready ;)
(I'm the "Eric!" you chatted with on the Xena server)
